mapper.insert: insert into address(openId, adressId, receName, gender, phoneNum, address, def) value (#{openId}, UUID_SHORT(), #{receName}, #{gender}, #{phoneNum}, #{address}, #{def})
mapper.delete: delete from address where openId=#{openId} and adressId=#{adressId}
mapper.select: select * from address where openId=#{openId} and adressId=#{adressId}
mapper.update: update address set receName=#{receName},gender=#{gender},phoneNum=#{phoneNum},address=#{address},def=#{def} where openId=#{openId} and adressId=#{adressId}
